description: department of national defense has a requirement for temporary help services and has issued a request for proposal to suppliers generated from cpps who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
full_summary:
**Tender Notice**
================.mousePosition

**Title**
--------

### English

NPP – S#4432328 - THS SA – One (1) Special Advisor. Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

### French

APM – S#4432328 - AMA SAT – Un (1) Conseiller Spécial. Les services d'aide temporaire contre arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement pour la région de la capitale nationale.

**Reference**
------------

cb-5329-42833297

**Amendment**
------------

1

**Solicitation**
---------------

S4432328

**Publication Date**
-------------------

2023-05-10

**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------

2023-05-12T15:00:00

**Response Format**
-------------------

The deadline for submission has passed.

**Subject**
---------

Temporary Help Services Requirement

**Description**
---------------

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking Temporary Help Services through a Request for Proposal (RFP) issued under the Supply Arrangement (SA) EN578-172870. The requirement is open to suppliers qualified under Stream 13 - Policy and Advisory - Special Advisor.

The following Supply Arrangement holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

• 1019837 Ontario Inc.
• 8513929 Canada Inc.
• AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED
• Cistel Technology Inc.
• Cofomo Ottawa
• Contract Community Inc.
• Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
• CyberVisor Corporation
• Etico, Inc.
• Humaxis Transformation Consulting, Inc.
• Olav Consulting Corp
• Risk Sciences International Inc.
• TECH4SOFT INC., Expertise Technology Consulting Inc., in joint venture
• The AIM Group Inc.
• The VCAN Group Inc.

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

Bid submissions will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This procurement is covered by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

**Delivery and Performance Location**
-------------------------------------

The work will be performed in Canada.

**Contracting Entity Information**
---------------------------------

Contracting entity: Department of National Defense
Address: 60 Moodie Drive
City: Ottawa
Province: Ontario
Postal code: K2H8G1
Country: Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Contractor contact: CFSG(O
